english_example_sentence: In the past, you would serve this beautiful city with great dedication.
russian_example_sentence: В прошлом ты служил этому прекрасному городу с большой самоотдачей.
turkish_example_sentence: Eskiden, bu güzel şehre büyük bir özveriyle hizmet ederdin.
